QuestData.Title: Signs and Portents
QuestData.Description:
<The bulletin that Mayor White was posting at the time he was struck by the spell indicates that there have been some strange happenings in the town lately.
It is likely these events are connected to whatever cast this spell on the village.
Perhaps there might be records from other villagers that could shed some light on the source of this magic.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the villagers' writings in Fallhaven.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The town's ledger lists a record of the comings and goings of people and goods through the city of Fallhaven.>
QuestData.RewardText:
<The writings you were able to find all have one common thread - an old woman who recently arrived in town.
This ledger may contain some information to her whereabouts.>
